Settings.ShowParseWarningsHint: Display warnings when archetype features cannot be automatically parsed

FixDialog.Title: Resolve Feature
FixDialog.Description: This feature could not be automatically parsed. What does it replace?
FixDialog.IsAdditive: This is an additive feature (doesn't replace anything)

Notifications.NoClasses: This actor has no class items. Add a class first.
Notifications.AlreadyApplied: {name} is already applied to this class.
Notifications.RollbackComplete: Application failed. Changes have been rolled back.
Notifications.CorruptedData: Corrupted data in {section} section was reset.
Notifications.GMOnly: Only the GM can modify this section.
Notifications.CompendiumError: Failed to load archetype compendium. Check that pf1e-archetypes is enabled.

Confirmation.ApplyMessage: Are you sure you want to apply {name} to {class}? This will modify the class features.
Confirmation.RemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from {class}? Class features will be restored to original.
